messages.subject: Interesting article - but see who prompted the study
messages.msgSnippet: This is an article about the safety of water on airline flights. While the subject may or may not be interesting to you, about halfway through the article
messages.messageBody:
This is an article about the safety of water on airline flights. While the
subject may or may not be interesting to you, about halfway through the
article something caught my eye that prompted me to share it with you:

http://msnbc.com/news/829189.asp?pne=msn

Go about half-way down the page to see who the "scientist" is that started
the study.

Okay, if you don't want to look yourself, here's the phrase that caught my
eye:

"Our own suspicions about the water came from an unlikely quarter: Zach
Bjornson-Hooper, a home-schooled 13-year-old from Alamo, Calif . . ."


Billy
FUN Books - www.FUN-Books.com
Family Unschoolers Network - www.unschooling.org
